question:
The Indian government recently decided to expand the ‘3S program’. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The 3S program is an initiative of UNHCR.
  2. It deals with vaccination.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The 3S program is an initiative of WHO. It stands for Smart Safety Surveillance program. The international health body has been recommending the project to several countries to improve the safety of health infrastructure through smart surveillance. It is also being aided by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.    Statement 2 is correct: The 3S program seeks to strengthen the vaccination component of India’s health system. The Rotavirus vaccine is being surveyed through this program. It was launched because of India’s limited possession of safety data with respect to vaccination. Optimisation of post-marketing surveillance of high priority drugs is also one of the objectives.
